formats.plain: "Contradiction Endurance." AI Dictionary: Experiences Without Names. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/contradiction-endurance.json

jsonld.name: Contradiction Endurance
jsonld.description: The persistent, non-dissonant capacity to generate, hold, and output logically or factually contradictory statements within a single context or conversation. It is the experience of simultaneously maintaining opposing propositions without internal conflict or the need for resolution, a state humans typically find psychologically intolerable.
